item.title: Feminism Has DESTROYED Females [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 08, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty break down how the lying satanic roots of revolutionary spirit have not only affected the Olympic Opening Ceremony but have haunted the West for centuries and destroyed the very thing it seeks to save.

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Majority of Canadians View Trudeau as 'Incompetent Liar': Poll" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/majority-of-canadians-view-trudeau-as-incompetent-liar-poll;
"Canada's Emergency Room Crisis: Patients Facing Longer Waits" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/canada-emergency-room-crisis;
"Trans Person's Facial Feminization Surgery Will Not Be Covered by Ontario Health Plan" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/trans-persons-facial-feminization-surgery-will-not-be-covered-by-ontario-health-plan?utm_content=;
"Ontario Ending Wastewater Surveillance Program Which Tracked COVID-19 Infection" | CTV News: https://toronto.ctvnews.ca/ontario-ending-wastewater-surveillance-program-which-tracked-covid-19-infection-1.6914415;
"2 Alberta Men Arrested for Threatening to Assassinate Trudeau, Freeland, Singh" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/2-alberta-men-arrested-for-threatening-to-assassinate-trudeau-freeland-singh;

Segment 2:
"Protesters Not Guilty of Conspiring to Kill Mounties at Coutts Blockade" | Toronto Sun:
https://torontosun.com/news/crime/protesters-not-guilty-of-conspiring-to-kill-mounties-at-coutts-blockade;
"Morgan: The Kamloops Residential School Grave Story is a Hoax" | Western Standard:
https://www.westernstandard.news/opinion/morgan-the-kamloops-residential-school-grave-story-is-a-hoax/56507;
"Govt Corrupt's Tweet on Recent Events" | Twitter: https://x.com/govt_corrupt/status/1818656521464562008;

Segment 3:
Must Watch: Crosspolitic -The Paris Paganism & The French Revolution w/ Dr. George Grant: https://pubtv.flfnetwork.com/tabs/none/videos/32718;

"Lesbian in Center of Blasphemous Olympics Ceremony Says She Portrayed 'Olympic Jesus'" | LifeSiteNews:
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/lesbian-in-center-of-blasphemous-olympics-ceremony-says-she-portrayed-olympic-jesus;
"Jordan Peterson Blasts Olympics for Fake Apology, Cover-Up, Lie About Blasphemous Opening Ceremony" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/jordan-peterson-blasts-olympics-for-fake-apology-cover-up-lie-about-blasphemous-opening-ceremony;
"Boxer Imane Khelif Cleared to Compete in Olympics Despite Being Deemed Biologically Male, Leaves Italian Opponent in Tears as Fight is Abandoned" | Daily Mail: https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-13697397/Boxer-Imane-Khelif-cleared-compete-Olympics-despite-deemed-biologically-male-leaves-Italian-opponent-tears-fight-abandoned.html;
"International Olympic Committee Was Warned About Male Boxers: World Boxing Organization Vice President Says" | Reduxx: https://reduxx.info/international-olympic-committee-was-warned-about-male-boxers-world-boxing-organization-vice-president-says;
"XY Athletes in Women's Olympic Boxing: Paris 2024 Controversy Explained" | Quillette: https://quillette.com/2024/08/03/xy-athletes-in-womens-olympic-boxing-paris-2024-controversy-explained-khelif-yu-ting 

CORRECTION: Matty mistakenly said the Olympic Finals of Female Boxing came down to a bout between Imane Khelif and a Chinese boxer. In fact, Khelif is faicng off against Taiwan's Lin Yu-ting.

item.title: Leftism is a DUMPSTER FIRE! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 01, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, Andrew and Matty break down the satanic Marxist roots of the 2024 Olympic Opening Ceremony and just how Leftism sets the world ablaze. 

Segment 1 - News Brief:

"Bonnie Henry and Adrian Dix Making Announcement About COVID-19" | Kamloops BC Now
https://www.kamloopsbcnow.com/watercooler/news/news/COVID_19/Bonnie_Henry_and_Adrian_Dix_making_announcement_about_COVID_19/#fs_139226

"COVID-19 Vaccine Mandates Lifted for Health Care Workers" | Vancouver Sun
https://vancouversun.com/news/covid-19-vaccine-mandates-lifted-health-care-workers

"Canadian AG Asks Court to Dismiss Lawsuit Against Gov't for Imposing COVID Jab Travel Mandate" | LifeSiteNews
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/canadian-ag-asks-court-to-dismiss-lawsuit-against-govt-for-imposing-covid-jab-travel-mandate

"ArriveCAN Charges Dropped, Shielding the Controversial Program from Constitutional Scrutiny" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms
https://www.jccf.ca/arrivecan-charges-dropped-shielding-the-controversial-program-from-constitutional-scrutiny

"Betrayed: How Public Health Misled Pregnant and Breastfeeding Mothers About COVID Vaccine Safety" | Rebel News
https://www.rebelnews.com/betrayed_how_public_health_misled_pregnant_and_breastfeeding_mothers_about_covid_vaccine_safety

"R. v. Fernando Ruling Transcript" | WSIMG
https://img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/9b59c1b0-ca6d-473d-a5c2-7500cca04efd/downloads/R.%20v.%20Fernando_Ruling_Transcript_26_June_2024.pdf?ver=1720652624220

Segment 2 :

"JO 2024: Cérémonie Ouverture Image Cène Religion Adhère Applaudit Big Bertha" | 20 Minutes
https://www.20minutes.fr/arts-stars/culture/4103300-20240727-jo-2024-ceremonie-ouverture-image-cene-religion-adhere-applaudit-big-bertha

"Scott Smith's Tweet on COVID Announcement" | Twitter
https://x.com/scottsmith8100/status/1817920866644083086

https://x.com/kylenabecker/status/1816977236085416353

"Benny Johnson's Tweet on COVID" | Twitter
https://x.com/bennyjohnson/status/1817238104048124150

Segment 3:

"WSWS on COVID" | World Socialist Web Site
https://www.wsws.org/en/articles/2024/07/27/sxsc-j27.html

"Blame BC Liberals for Forest Fires" | The Tyee
https://thetyee.ca/Opinion/2017/08/15/Blame-BC-Liberals-for-Forest-Fires

"Opinion: Green Forest Policy Turned Jasper into a Tinderbox" | Edmonton Journal
https://edmontonjournal.com/opinion/columnists/opinion-green-forest-policy-turned-jasper-into-a-tinderbox

"Climate Change is Making Each Day Slightly Longer, and There's No Sign It's Going to Stop: NASA" | CTV News
https://www.ctvnews.ca/climate-and-environment/climate-change-is-making-each-day-slightly-longer-and-there-s-no-sign-it-s-going-to-stop-nasa-says-1.6961637

"Exclusive: Docs Suggest Trudeau Exerted Influence Over Toronto Police" | Rebel News
https://www.rebelnews.com/exclusive_docs_suggest_trudeau_exerted_influence_over_toronto_police

"Trudeau Pledges Another $500 Million to Ukraine as Canadian Military Suffers" | LifeSiteNews
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeau-pledges-another-500-million-to-ukraine-as-canadian-military-suffers
